title: You Yao Qi Xia Ri Guanggao Pian
synopsis: The CM series of different animes in You Yao Qi anime studio.

title: Kaixin Baobei
synopsis: In the universe, there is a place where humans, robots and aliens live together, the "star ball". The Universe Development Company of Disheartened Planet sent two ace fighters, "General Big Monster" and "Corporal Little Monster," to forcefully occupy there. They carry the ultimate weapon, five-color magic gems-a kind of strange crystallization that can give life and wisdom to machines. With this powerful force, they are enough to complete this task. But when the spacecraft rushed into the atmosphere, an accident happened: in addition to the black gems, the other red, pink, green, and blue gems were lost. On the star planet, there is a genius mechanic, Dr. Zhai, who accidentally activated four gems while repairing abandoned electrical garbage. Since then, Happy Superman, Sweetheart Superman, Flowery Superman and Careless Superman were born. Under the leadership of Dr. Zhai, they frustrated the invaders' conspiracy again and again...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Kaixin Baobei Zhi Kaixin Chaoren
synopsis: The Superman team headed by Happy Superman has added a new member-Beware Superman. The Five Superman team finally gathered together successfully. Dr. Zhai decided to officially send Superman to the campus——Superstar Academy. Happy that Superman has to adapt to school life while facing various challenges. In order to disrupt the study of Superman, the big blame decided to mix into the school as a school worker. At the same time, he arranged for the little monster to enter the Superstar Academy to study, and become classmates with Superman, looking for opportunities to steal information. Just when the big monster was preparing to implement this plan, the Commander of the Disheartened Planet could not wait, and he personally came to the star orb and opened a monster training academy to train all kinds of monsters to destroy the star orb.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Kaixin Baobei Zhi Kaixin Chao Renda Zuozhan
synopsis: The planet Adri, which once had abundant resources, was destroyed under the aggression of the heads of the planets. Admiral Rogaro, the last guardian of Adristar, will never be seen. However, this time, he appeared in the star sphere as the commander of the gray star sphere. In order to prevent his aggression, watch out for a fierce battle with Superman. In the course of the battle, their friendship has also been sublimated... The star ball has threatened by third-party forces. Happy Superman and his partners are facing an unprecedented crisis. At this critical moment, Superman needs to improve their strength. , With greater courage and firmer friendship, complete the important task of protecting the star ball. Super people will gain new skills, and their locomotives will become more advanced in appearance, with new features such as fit. (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心宝贝之开心超人大作战

title: Kaixin Baobei Zhi Kaixin Da Maoxian
synopsis: As superhumans who protect the planets, apart from fighting fiercely when encountering danger, how to make the residents of the planets live and work and enjoy ordinary happiness seems to be more challenging. The two bad guys, Daguai and Xiaoguai, also turned their sights on the common people of the star ball, thinking that it is the best way to conquer the star ball step by step. Happy Superman and other Superman will come to the frustrated planet with many dangers this time, launch various adventures, and obtain a more powerful new motorcycle man. In this process, it is full of danger and tension, but there are also many oolongs. Funny content abounds.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心宝贝之开心大冒险

title: Kaixin Baobei Zhi Kaixin Xing Xingqiu
synopsis: Disheartened Planet sent a large number of invaders to the star orb many years ago, but because of the shipwreck, those invaders were all lost in the star orb and could not be found again. The big monster and the little monster got the list of the year from the commander, step by step in the star ball to find the invading army of the year, and find the aggression plan of the discouraged planet in the past. At the same time, when invading the planetary orbs in the past, the army of the frustrated planet also spread a virus. As long as the infected person can be controlled with the remote control, many people are infected without knowing it. While fighting against the dark virus, the Supermen must also use probation to let the infected person resolve the virus. However, what the Supermen didn’t know was that Dr. Zhai, who was on a business trip, was also infected with the virus...(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心宝贝之开心星星球

title: Kaixin Baobei Zhi Gu Ling Xing Lixian Ji
synopsis: The people of Star Planet discovered a new planet, Guling Star, which is a mysterious planet with various mysterious resources. In order to find a very dangerous radioactive element in it, the Supermen, led by Li Men and the TV principal, went to explore the mysterious and primitive Gulin Star; the monsters and monsters were looking for the three legendary guardians of the Gulin Star. A Superman, while looking for an energy stone that can invade the planet, quietly boarded the Superman's spacecraft and "smuggled" to Gulin Star. Supermen have discovered many magical and fun things in the adventure, and the destruction of monsters and monsters has made the adventure life full of danger. However, a series of incidents that happened unintentionally made the expedition members suspicious-is Gulin Star really as primitive as it seems? (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心宝贝之古灵星历险记

title: Kaixin Baobei Zhi Kaixin Lianmeng Zhengba Zhan
synopsis: Star Planet has two special guests: Ambassador Wang Caixing and Ambassador Miaomeixing. It is said that the two ambassadors were sent to the Star Planet to establish diplomatic relations with the Star Planet. However, Wang Caixing and Meowme Star are two hostile planets, and they quarrel with each other. The purpose of their coming to the star planet this time is to establish diplomatic relations with the star planet on the one hand, and on the other hand to prevent the other side from getting better. At the same time, the children of the two ambassadors, Lele and Coco, are studying at the Superstar Academy. The quarrel between the two children made Superman save the star ball while also preventing disasters caused by the quarrel. At the end of this season, Galo, who appeared from the third season, sacrificed to protect the star ball.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心宝贝之开心联盟争霸战

title: Kaixin Baobei Zhi Qihuan Zhi Lu
synopsis: The ball length of Star Planet was attacked by monsters and new partners-hahaha, unconscious. Teacher Baishitong discovered that only by finding the four magic wands of Fenghuo Leibing in a mysterious book that records the customs of the Middle Ages, can the ball be saved. In order to grow the ball, the Supermen came to the Middle Ages town, with the help of the local residents and the king, using limited clues to find the wand left by the national teacher Xiaohaha. The monsters did not want Superman to get the wand, so they went to the small town and waited for the opportunity to stop Superman from looking for the wand with the help of hahaha. Finally, the Supermen gathered their magic wands and used their power to save the ball leader, once again frustrating the conspiracy of the big and small monsters. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Kaixin Baobei Zhi Qihuan Zhi Lu
synopsis: The ball length of Star Planet was attacked by monsters and new partners-hahaha, unconscious. Teacher Baishitong discovered that only by finding the four magic wands of Fenghuo Leibing in a mysterious book that records the customs of the Middle Ages, can the ball be saved. In order to grow the ball, the Supermen came to the Middle Ages town, with the help of the local residents and the king, using limited clues to find the wand left by the national teacher Xiaohaha. The monsters did not want Superman to get the wand, so they went to the small town and waited for the opportunity to stop Superman from looking for the wand with the help of hahaha. Finally, the Supermen gathered their magic wands and used their power to save the ball leader, once again frustrating the conspiracy of the big and small monsters. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Chao Shikong Baowei Zhan
synopsis: After Zhai Jia's disappearance, Xiao Zhai wanted to design a time machine based on the time machine design drawing left by his father. After working hard many times, he realized that the finished time machine can only travel to the time when the time machine exists. 25 years later, Happy Superman accidentally discovered the time machine and accidentally passed the time machine to the time when Dr. Zhai was young. Due to the special setting of the time machine, Dr. Zhai can only go back to the past. When he was a child, Dr. Zhai was lonely and had no friends. Superman decided to stay in the past and take care of Dr. Zhai as his brothers and sisters, so that Dr. Zhai would be cheerful and learn to take care of himself. Looking for a way to return to the future, the other side also has to deal with the destruction of monsters and monsters.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之超时空保卫战

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Yingxiong Guilai
synopsis: Enable the new style of painting. The story immediately follows the end of the previous season. Supermen bid farewell to the little house and returned to the present, continuing to guard the planet. However, the current star ball has a greater crisis waiting for them: the commander sends a magic cloak to the big monster, which can take out many props to enhance the monster's ability, so that the big monster and the little monsters can more easily invade the star ball. In order to cope with this crisis, Superman also continued to improve his skills in the Superstar Academy to better guard the planet. At the same time, Garo, who died in order to protect the planet in the seventh season, returns with the help of Adristar boy Archie this season and lives with Superman and Superman again. However, in the process of fighting the big monster, the pure-hearted Galo accidentally pulled out the evil halberd that only the truly evil can pick up. What is the reason for...?(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之英雄归来

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Xingji Weiji
synopsis: There was a devastating explosion in the distant Gulin Star, and the three surviving Supermen-Hearty Superman, Sad Superman, and Nasty Superman came to the star sphere to ask Happy Superman for help. In order to maintain the justice of the universe, the five supermen, headed by Happy Superman, decided to find the truth about the explosion of Gulin Star. In addition to the return of the most popular supporting actor, Gulin Star, Three Superman, there will also be new villains and mechanical monsters on stage.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之星际危机

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Xingji Lianmeng
synopsis: It mainly tells what happened during the assessment process when Superman wants to join the Superman Alliance. At the same time, Galo goes out to study the secrets of energy nuclear. In the plot, this season uses a two-line interweaving method for the first time; in terms of characters, this season not only has new characters such as Bai Lianfa, Jiu, Bobo, Hanke, but also Duan Daoliu, Shaolong, Zhang Lang, and Yifei. Waiting for the return of the old people is more attractive. [7] Moon Dance and Star Shadow were escorted to the Universe Prison by Interplanetary Police Stan for destroying Gulin Star and seizing the energy core. In order to find the truth about the explosion of the Adri Star, Gallo went to the Interstellar Prison to investigate, but the Interstellar Prison was attacked by a mysterious man, and Moon Dance and Star Shadow’s memories of energy nuclei were deleted, so Gallo prepared to investigate the mysterious man. On the other hand, Hank, the examiner of the Superman League, came to the star to open the registration for the Superman League. The story of the five Superman and others who want to join the Superman League's assessment process began. During the assessment, the Five Supermen, other examinees and examiners accidentally discovered that when Galo sleeps or loses consciousness, he will be controlled by a mysterious dark force to become a mysterious person and seize the energy core. Galo chose to learn the truth. Restrained his strength and fell into an eternal sleep. (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之星际联盟

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Nengyuan He Shouhu Zhe
synopsis: Happy Superman leads the 4 Supermen to the discouraged planet to trace the whereabouts of the escaped Moondance Star Shadow, but accidentally discovers that the purpose of the Moondance Star Shadow is the energy core of the discouraged star. In the process of tracing, Superman accidentally learned that Big Guai turned out to be the real culprit behind the invading Star Orb, but in order to protect the frustrated planet, Superman decided to temporarily cooperate with Big Guai against Moondance Star Shadow. In the process, they not only discovered the major secrets hidden behind the five energy cores, but also learned the true source of the dark power in Galo.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之能源核守护者

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Xingzhi Li
synopsis: In ancient times, six supermen joined forces to fight against monsters to guard the peace of the universe. The core Superman, one of the Six Supermen, has been pursuing the most powerful force in order to better protect the people. In order to fight against the monsters, the Six Superman combined the power of the six people to extract a powerful energy-the power of the stars, which is a life force that can break through the darkness. However, the Six Superman separated the dark power while refining the power of the stars. The dark power was destructive. For the safety of the universe, the core superman actively absorbed the dark power. The power of not wanting dark magnified the core superman's desire to pursue power, and eventually the core superman was swallowed by desire and became a dark demon that harmed the universe. The Five Supermen had to use the power of the star to defeat the dark demon, and turned into five energy cores to seal the dark demon, and the power of the star also disappeared.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之星之力

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Xingzhi Li
synopsis: In ancient times, six supermen joined forces to fight against monsters to guard the peace of the universe. The core Superman, one of the Six Supermen, has been pursuing the most powerful force in order to better protect the people. In order to fight against the monsters, the Six Superman combined the power of the six people to extract a powerful energy-the power of the stars, which is a life force that can break through the darkness. However, the Six Superman separated the dark power while refining the power of the stars. The dark power was destructive. For the safety of the universe, the core superman actively absorbed the dark power. The power of not wanting dark magnified the core superman's desire to pursue power, and eventually the core superman was swallowed by desire and became a dark demon that harmed the universe. The Five Supermen had to use the power of the star to defeat the dark demon, and turned into five energy cores to seal the dark demon, and the power of the star also disappeared.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之星之力

title: Kaixin Chaoren Zhi Baoxiao Xing Xingqiu
synopsis: "Happy Superman: Funny Star Ball" is a short series of happy short films. The story is based on the magical "Star Ball". It tells the five cuteness of Happy Superman, Sweetheart Superman, Huaxin Superman, Careless Superman and Careful Superman (the second appearance) The story of the clever little Superman fighting against the evil forces represented by the "Big Monster General" and "Little Monster Corporal". The film intercepted the content of "Happy Baby" seasons 1-9 to form a short-film drama. Each episode displays 3 to 5 short films, all of which are classic clips appearing in the drama.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人之爆笑星星球

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Shenqi Shiyan Shi
synopsis: Continue to continue the relaxed and hilarious style of "Happy Superman League", with a more fashionable and modern style, and lead the audience to explore the big discoveries behind the small life. (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之神奇实验室

title: Kaixin Chaoren Lianmeng Zhi Mi Zhi Cheng
synopsis: In the 16902 year of the universe, there was an "Adrian Star" in the vast universe, where a powerful and special energy was found, which was coveted by other planets in the universe, and several forces competed endlessly. In order to prevent the "Adristar" from bringing disasters, the "Adristar"'s war gods built a deep sea lost city on the "Earth Star", buried energy in it, and divided the key to open the sea lost city into five pieces, set Five puzzles to stop evil people. 4000 years later, the current God of War, Galo, and his good friend Beware of Superman to hunt down the stolen monster, were drawn to this "earth star" and also involved in a "mysterious lake monster incident." During the period, they met Lisa, a girl who was looking for her missing friend in the mysterious lake, and together they solved the mystery of the water monster. However, Gallo discovered that all of this is inextricably related to Adristar, so everyone embarked on a journey of investigating the five major puzzles. (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 开心超人联盟之谜之城

title: Kaixin Chaoren
synopsis: Star Planet is a planet with rapid technological development. Today, the residents here cannot live without the Internet every day. Once, Happy Superman accidentally interrupted the network cable during a fight with a monster, causing chaos in the Star Orb network, but in fact, this was the plan of the General, the Disheartened Planet. The genius Mechanic Shapeshifter, who was once as good as Dr. Zhai, was punished for plagiarism, and finally went astray for revenge. He used a computer virus he invented to control the star sphere through intrusion into the network. The consequences were uncontrollable: a large number of unidentified objects suddenly appeared from the electronic screen in a mysterious building in the city center, the blue light defense system was easily broken, and the Five Superman's locomotive was serious. Destroyed, Superman was seriously injured... The biggest crisis ever happened in the star ball! Only fragile citizens remain on the star planet. How will the injured Happy Superman defend his homeland?(translated from baidu baike)

title: Kaixin Chaoren 2 Qi Yuan Xingzhi Zhan
synopsis: On the eve of the reunion festival, Happy Superman and his four little friends participated in the Superman Star Ball competition, and met a good friend Zhang Lang who came to the competition, and the big monster and the little monsters also came out as scheduled. During the game, the other four Supermen, Little Monsters, and all other participating Supermen disappeared strangely, leaving only Happy Superman, Big Monster and Zhang Lang. In order to rescue the missing partners and little monsters, Happy Superman, Big Monster and Zhang Lang embark on an adventure together. During the adventure, the three met a group of cute mini supermen who escaped from reality and lived in seclusion. They rescued the Doctor House who was kidnapped by the villain's minions, and found a mysterious museum... There are more and more mysteries on the adventure, so happy By solving these mysteries one by one, Superman learned about the shocking conspiracy of the villain behind the scenes, and with the help of Doctor House, Mini Superman, Big Monster and Little Monster, rescued everyone, destroyed the villain's crazy plan, and saved the world once again.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Qin Shi Mingyue Zhi Jingke Waizhuan
synopsis: The anime before the season 1 of Qin Shi Mingyue.

title: Qin Shimingyue 2015 National Day Special
synopsis: The special episode of Qin Shimingyue .

title: Qin Shimingyue 2016 Chinese New year Special
synopsis: The special episode of Qin Shimingyue.

title: Mars Red: Zero Kikan Nippou
synopsis: Mini web anime streamed online leading up to the Mars Red TV anime premiere.

title: Pont Qiao Booth
synopsis: Anime uploaded to Youtube based on studio Bridge's original characters, Pont and Qiao.

title: Qin Shi Mingyue Zhi Haixing Dadao
synopsis: The special episode of Qin Shi Mingyue.

title: Qin Shi Mingyue Zhi Xiao Chuangjianghu
synopsis: The story begins in the Qin Dynasty more than two thousand years ago. King Qin defeated the six kingdoms, unified the world, called "Qin Shi Huang", and imposed a brutal rule on the people of the world. Therefore, the hero of the world, the leader of the Mo family, rose up and resisted, making Qin Shi Huang scorched and angry. Therefore, in order to completely eradicate the anti-Qin forces, King Qin dispatched the Prime Minister Li Si Li, who is known for his flattering and full of bad ideas, and found the ghost in the wicked world and the big brother in the bad guys-Wei Zhuang. People spurted blood to the silent fools: Bai Feng, Chi Lian, Canglang King and Wushuang Ghosts formed a gold medal group of evil men who used all kinds of poisonous tricks, tricks, evil tricks, and tricks to unify the arena and eliminate all opposition. Qin people. In a match, the famous hero Gaie Nie, who was famous all over the world, was accidentally defeated by one person who defeated Qin Bing's "Thousand Armies and Ten Thousand Horses" (a total of two people, one is called "Thousand Army" and the other is called "Wan Ma"). In order to avoid the pursuit of Qin Bing and the harassment of the fans, he and his apprentice Tianming went to the Xiang clan who passed the Jianghu standard certification and was famous for being suitable for fleeing, hiding, hiding debts, and avoiding enemies. Unexpectedly, although Xiang Shaoyu, the leader of the Xiang clan, was usually coaxed, he was useless at the critical moment. As a result, even Xiangjiazhuang was attacked by Weizhuang and Qin Bing. The three of them could only escape into the world’s last base of anti-Qin activists. , An advanced civilized manor in the world of rivers and lakes-Mojia Manor took refuge. The head of the Mojia Manor is an inventor, but an old class master, plus Duan Murong, a goddess doctor who specializes in intractable diseases and tells people that others are sick, and her weird apprentice Gao In the month, there are also the cool duo Gao Jianli and Xue Nu, as well as the thief who is known as the best thief in the world, and the thief who is actually very poor-sighted, and the muscular man who is always hungry and has a brain. Encountering such a group of masters and masters, the arrogant Wei Zhuang finally met a tough opponent, and a bloody, turbulent confrontation officially kicked off. Wei Zhuang invited the evil inventor who hated Master Ban for defeating himself in the invention competition, so he tried every possible means to avenge his enemies, and wanted to eradicate the Mo Family Manor in one fell swoop. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Qin Shi Mingyue Zhi Xiao Chuangjianghu season 2
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 秦时明月之笑闯江湖 第二季

title: Xiong Chumo Zhi Xiongxiong Leyuan 2
synopsis: Childhood bald head Qiang went through the magic tree hole to Dashu Kindergarten, and studied happily with childhood children such as Xiong Da, Xiong Er, Ji Ji, Mao Mao, Beng Beng, Tu Tu, Carrot Head, etc., get along friendly and enjoy the beauty of childhood Time, explore the mysteries of magical natural science, discover the joys of life. Based on the perspective of preschool children, this film guides children to understand the truth in life, learn knowledge in play, and learn to think in games through healthy, humorous, educational and joyful growth stories. Education is fun.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiong Chumo Zhi Tanxian Riji 2
synopsis: After the tiger hunting expeditions of Xiong Da, Xiong Er, Bald Qiang and Zhao Lin ended, Gou Xiong Ling established a nature reserve, which became a famous animal paradise, Black Wind, Jumping, Kangaroo Mother, Scrubbing, Three Old circus friends such as Corgi, Leidi, Gaga, and Grandma Elephant came to the reserve and started a new life through Xiong Da’s letter. The bald head became the gold guide of the reserve, and Zhao Lin became a volunteer in the reserve. . However, at this time, the new villains, genius Wei and Dong Dongyao, caught animals in the forest to earn research funds from Boss Wang. He even extended his magic claws to the mountain god dumplings of Baixiong Mountain, and built a geonuclear energy extraction device, which severely damaged the ecological environment of the snowy mountains and threatened the safety of Gouxongling. In order to fight against the genius and protect the animals and the forest, Xiong Da, Xiong Er, Bald Qiang, and Zhao Lin united again and went deep into the forest, the Kingdom of Birds of Prey and the snow-capped mountains. After all the hardships, they defeated the tricks of the genius and finally defeated them. Genius Wei stopped the earth's nuclear machinery, and the snow-capped mountains returned to their usual calm. The positive energy and environmental protection themes such as adventure and growth, friendship and dreams, love of nature, caring for forests, and protecting animals run through the film, staged scenes of wonderfully funny, thrilling, and touching new adventure stories.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiong Chumo Zhi Xiongxiong Leyuan 3
synopsis: "Bear-infested Bear Paradise 3" is the 12th season of bear-infested cartoons and also the third season of Bear-infested Bear Paradise. Continuing the plot of the previous episode, it is unfolded in the kindergarten with big trees in the forest. Xiong Da, Xiong Er, Bald Head Qiang, Ji Ji, Mao Mao, Beng Beng, Tu Tu and Carrot Head take place between classes, after class, and in life. Interesting stories of... On the basis of the original entertaining and sophisticated production, a series of new characters such as "Mao Mao Dad" have been added. The parent-child theme runs through the overall story, which further meets the needs of fans and the whole family to watch together.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiong Chumo Zhi Quaishou Jihua
synopsis: The TV cartoon "Bear-Haunted Monster Project" is a continuation of the plots in "Bear-Haunted Adventure Diary" and "Bear-Haunted Adventure Diary 2". Especially in the "Bear-Haunted Adventure Diary 2", the development of the star character "Genius Wei", the villain "Genius Wei" reappears, and behind the scenes Boss Wang will also appear in this movie, Boss Wang is going to be real. The film tells the story of Tiancaiwei creating an "invincible mechanical monster" to create a forest crisis, and "Xiong Qiang" teaming up to guard the homeland to meet the viewing needs of children aged 6-12. The role of the film is rich in emotions and the storyline is ups and downs, which fully meets the viewing needs of children aged 6-12, and brings a variety of character education to the child audience. Tian Caiwei discovered an energy stone, he wanted to use the energy stone to create an invincible monster that dominates the land, sea and air, shocking the scientific community. In order to collect the abilities of the animals, the cunning Genius Wei created a variety of lifelike collectors to confuse the animals and seize the abilities. For the harmony and tranquility of the forest, Bald Head Qiang, Xiong Da, and Xiong Er joined the small animals to fight against Tiancaiwei and Dongdongyao, staged a series of amusing or crisis-ridden power battles...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiong Chumo·Kuang Ye Dalu
synopsis: Gou Xiong Ling recently developed the Wild Continent, so Xiong Da Xiong Er drove to participate in the Wild Continent. Finally, he was distracted by a mysterious person. Finally, Lotte told his own difficulties. Originally, Lele could still live, but because Fell ill and died. After that, Lotte surrendered and decided to stand with Xiong Daxiong Er Shaoqiang, so he invented a genetic bracelet. But some people have accidentally become animals. And behind the scenes Tom is the villain. Then there was a touching and warm family relationship, and finally Lotte asked Xiao Ke to continue living. Don’t want Lele to die, so Xiaoke listened to Lele’s words and continued to live(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiong Chumo Zhi Xiongxiong Huanle Song
synopsis: Fangte Animation released the long-awaited nursery rhyme animation "Ode to the Bear" for 0-3 years old. The project uses healthy and progressive nursery rhymes and fashionable and dynamic pop music elements, arranged according to a style that is easily accepted by parents and children, and expresses vividly through the lovely images of little bear big, little bear two, and little bald head.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Watashi ni Tenshi ga Maiorita! (Anime Shin Project)
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Synonyms: Wataten! An Angel Flew Down to Me
details.Japanese: 私に天使が舞い降りた! (アニメ新プロジェクト)

title: Seer
synopsis: In 2110 AD, the earth's energy was nearly exhausted, and environmental pollution became more and more serious. In order to realize the extraterrestrial galaxy exploration plan, humans have created a robot called Xaar and built the energy exploration spacecraft Xaar. In the process of cosmic exploration, they also discovered alien elves. These elves have become important helpers and partners of Xaar robots in exploring new energy. The evil forces headed by the cosmic pirate Obi Organization are arbitrarily plundering the resources of the universe to thwart their conspiracy. The heroic Purcell and their righteous elves fight together to protect the peace of the universe.(translated from baiodu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao Zhi Sheng Zhe Ni Xi
synopsis: But when the endless energy was found, the endless energy was destroyed by the cosmic pirate Obi Organization, and the Purcells had to find the second endless energy hidden in the depths of the universe and guarded by Pony.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao: Guangming De Jiushu
synopsis: Blake, unwilling to live under the curse of darkness, has always fought against his own destiny. This time, his future path is closely linked with Cassius. With the help of Xaar's vanguard team, Blake seeks endless energy. However, Purcell's misunderstanding of Black, her own experience, and the repeated obstruction of the evil spirit organization made this road of self-salvation extremely tortuous. Black's own way of doing things also involved Cassius in the battle, and the storyline became more tortuous and tense!(translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao: Zhanshen Fengyun Jue
synopsis: After the ancestor spirit beast used the endless energy to expel the dark power in the body for Black, the endless energy disappeared. Just as the Xaar vanguard team was disappointed, Dr. Pat accidentally discovered that the Phantom King's chip recorded about Ares. The legend of the crystal, so the God of War Alliance embarked on a journey to find the Ares Crystal with the assistance of the Xal vanguard team. After many hardships, the God of War Alliance finally eliminated the obstacles and defeated the pirates and evil spirits who also wanted to get involved in the crystal. After a fair duel, Rey finally won the Ares Crystal with strength. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao: Lie Tian Kun Shou
synopsis: After receiving endless energy, the Purcell returned to Earth to complete its mission. Unexpectedly, it encountered the Big Three and introduced the Purcell into the spacecraft tomb. Kallulu used Lisabubu's flower protector to protect the Vessel Purcell. Introducing the Eternal Frozen Shadow Black Hole, Purcell Pioneer Squad increased Purcell’s power, escaped the black hole, but accidentally entered the terrifying Buzz Star.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao: Cangqiong Liehuo
synopsis: The Xaar Pioneer Squad consisting of Sai Xiaoxi, Atieda, and Kallulu and the God of War Alliance found Eric, the long-lost brother of Rey, and found the three core energy sources of Helka Star, but Eric had The female endless energy taken away by Zongjing has been given to the legendary unicorn. So Sai Xiaoxi and his team began their journey to find a unicorn (translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao: Yuzhou Zhi Yan
synopsis: The Purcell accidentally deciphered the secret information of the pirate group and discovered a mysterious celestial body called the Eye of the Universe. And with the help of Monta, Mikha and Phantasmal Beast, the three planets competed against the pirate organization headed by Jiyue, and finally defeated Jiyue’s exclusive elven evil star, successfully guarded the Three Sacred Gems, and obtained the universe Interstellar way of the eye(translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao: Yuzhou Zhi Yan special
synopsis: The special episodes of season7 of Sai Er Hao

details.Japanese: 赛尔号：宇宙之眼  特別篇

title: Sai Er Hao: Huanmeng Zhan Ji
synopsis: The Purcell heading to the Eye of the Universe has to pass through a dangerous area called the Yadan Nebula Cave, but the Nebula Cave is enveloped by a layer of dream enchantment. Purcell is deeply trapped. Finding the dream god Hermes and revoking the enchantment, the Purcell continued to move to the tree of life domain in the Nebula Cave. The energy-stricken Purcell prepared to borrow the tree spirit of the tree of life to replenish energy, but at this time it occupied Sorensen in the tree of life domain is robbing the spirit of the tree and trying to use its energy to destroy Pony.....The tree of life domain was originally Pony’s training place, and Pony perceives the crisis in the tree of life domain and enters In this area, Sorensen was robbing the spirit of the tree while preparing to assemble his four heavenly kings and Pony to fight to the death. Faced with this crisis, the Xaar vanguard team decided to protect the tree spirit and save the life tree!(translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao: Pili Jiuchong Tian
synopsis: It mainly tells the story of the Xaar spacecraft accidentally strayed into the inverse space on the way to the Wyvern galaxy. In the inverse world, because the elf Cudillac stole the universe ring, everything was in a state of being reversed, and at the same time The Purcell encountered an unprecedented crisis. For this reason, the interstellar explorers Sai Xiaoxi, Atieda, and Kalulu embarked on an adventure. Gradually, the three of them discovered that this ring is actually related to Pony, Sorensen and Kudillac. All sorts of grievances...The ring was finally successfully retaken, and the reverse world was restored to normal. When the Purcell arrived in the Flying Dragon constellation and chose to stop at the Longan star for rest, at this time, the pirate Dean took away Harvey, the dragon, and at the same time Harvey and Bea’s child, Enni, the young dragon, also fell into the dragon. Dangerous sinkhole. Due to the lack of moisture from rain and dew, the environment of Longan star quickly deteriorated. At a critical moment, Sai Xiaoxi and the three went into the tiankeng to rescue Enni, and finally resolved the environmental crisis of Longan star with Enni’s awakening. Embark on the journey again and head towards the next stop Ursa!(translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao: Bing Feng Yaosai
synopsis: In order to solve the earth’s energy crisis, the Purcell is on the mission of discovering new energy in space. In mission after mission, it has delivered precious cosmic data and clean energy to the earth. During the voyage, the Purcell was blocked by a barrier called "Ice". In order to open the barrier, the Purcell vanguard team came to Snow Star, where they will encounter The mysterious big snow monster, there is a magnet on the giant bear star that records the true mystery of endless energy. In order to prevent the space pirates from making the first step, the Purcell assembled the God of War alliance, and they met the mysterious ultimate opponent...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Sai Er Hao Da Dianying 2: Lei Yi Yu Mai Er Si
synopsis: The cosmic pirate captured Miles, the spirit beast, and Miles gave the phantom gem to his son Monta before being captured, and sent it out of the phantom star. The Holy Spirit's Myers' cry for help alarmed Rey who was far away on Helka Star, and Rey reacted quickly to the Phantom Star. Monta, chased by pirates, broke into the Purcell and accidentally helped Sai Xiaoxi win the annual Elf Masters Cup trials. After learning about Monta's life, Sai Xiaoxi decided to help him rescue his father Miles with his teammates Atieda and Kalulu, and everyone embarked on a journey to find the Phantom Star.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 赛尔号大电影2：雷伊与迈尔斯

title: Sai Er Hao Da Dianying 3: Zhanshen Lianmeng
synopsis: The spiral galaxy in the universe has a beautiful planet-the planet Nass. There is a kind of magical fruit on the planet, which has always protected the ecological balance of the entire Nass star. The Agia tribe on the planet has guarded the tree of God for generations, but suddenly many cosmic pirates sneaked into the star Nath. It happened that the members of the Pioneer Squad on the Purcell, Sai Xiaoshi, Atieda, and Kalulu passed by here , They immediately joined the battle. As the battle escalated, four super elves: Thunder God Rey, Daredevil God Black, War God Gaia and Cursed Son Cassius also joined in.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 赛尔号大电影3：战神联盟

title: Sai Er Hao Da Dianying 4: Sheng Mo Zhi Zhan
synopsis: Legend has it that there is a magic stone that can absorb the energy of heaven and earth. When the energy of the magic stone is absorbed to a certain extent, he will have powerful energy. There is a best craftsman in the universe who knows that magic stones will do evil one day, so he uses his own efforts and soul to find ways to restrain magic stones, and he disappeared from everyone's sight. When the battle of the magic stone finally came, an elf wearing a red cloak came to the front of the Xaar Vanguard combat team. When all the truth came to light, their group embarked on a more dangerous journey.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 赛尔号大电影4：圣魔之战

title: Sai Er Hao Da Dianying 5: Leishen Jueqi
synopsis: After several battles, the Alliance of God of War established a "Thunder Guardian Bureau" on Helka to protect the three holy towers and the people of the planet. One day, a huge unexpected visitor suddenly appeared on Helka, hurting innocent elves and attempting to destroy the city. The Alliance of Gods of War quickly assembled. In the process of investigating the real murderer behind the scenes, Rey met the big villain Dr. Augusta. During the battle, Rey discovered the mystery of the death of his compatriot’s brother, but was also injured and was injured by Augusta. The tower aroused the evil forces in the body and fell into pain. At the time of the ultimate battle, the gods of war were called Rey to rise again, turn the tide, defeat the evil, and once again protect the justice of the universe and the peace of all people.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 赛尔号大电影5：雷神崛起

title: Sai Er Hao Da Dianying 6: Sheng Zhe Wudi
synopsis: Space pirates do whatever they want after Pony disappears. The Captain of the Purcell recalled Sai Xiaoshi, Kalulu, and Atieda to perform the arduous task of finding Pony, but he did not expect this news to be known to the elf catcher Kraka. In the end Pony defeated him with the return of the king Card, Sai Xiaoxi, etc. have completed their mission. (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 赛尔号大电影6：圣者无敌

title: Sai Er Hao Da Dianying 7: Fengkuang Jiqi Cheng
synopsis: While performing a mission to repair the spacecraft, Ah Tieda suddenly encountered a planetary explosion, and Ah Tieda could not escape the debris of the explosion, and then disappeared into the dark space. Everyone thought that Ah Tieda was martyred, but on another desolate planet, Ah Tieda survived like a miracle... (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 赛尔号大电影7：疯狂机器城

title: Moer Zhuangyuan Shiqian Ji
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Moer Zhuangyuan Zhou Bo Ju
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Moer Zhuangyuan
synopsis: There is a fertile land on the other side of the mountain, the home of the Moors and their elf Ram, Moore Manor. The little Moors brought their dearest elves to grow, work and live a happy life in this land, but they were destroyed by the evil magician Kura. The contest between justice and evil begins, whether the evil magician’s plan is successful, and whose mission to rescue Moore’s Manor will fall...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Moer Zhuangyuan Di Er Ji
synopsis: The genius boy RK broke through numerous obstacles and secretly investigated the whereabouts of his parents, but unexpectedly discovered the secret of the justice gene. The real identity of Superman Le Le Xia is the child adopted by Uncle Bodhi-Mo Le Le. What's even more incredible is that the justice gene in Molele originated from a failed experiment, and the chief researcher who participated in this experiment turned out to be his parents, and the identity of Lelexia was almost exposed...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Moer Zhuangyuan Di San Ji
synopsis: There is a fertile land on the other side of the mountain, the home of the Moors and their elf Ram, Moore Manor. The little Moors brought their dearest elves to grow, work and live a happy life in this land, but they were destroyed by the evil magician Kura. The contest between justice and evil begins, whether the evil magician’s plan is successful, and whose mission to rescue Moore’s Manor will fall...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Moer Zhuangyuan Da Dianying 3: Mohuan Lieche Da Maoxian
synopsis: In the sky tree house of Moore Manor, Mole Lele and Uncle Bodhi lead a peaceful life. Due to a misunderstanding, Molele missed a good opportunity to travel abroad. Sad Lele, but unexpectedly received a magical train ticket. Then, he summoned a train that descended from the sky and agreed to the three requirements on the ticket, starting an infinitely exciting journey. Molele and her friends went to the earth on their expeditions, but were also intercepted by fierce air bandits. The children were amazed by what they saw and heard along the way: the question mark of the crop circle; the adventure of the desert town; the surprise of the wormhole leap... (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 摩尔庄园大电影3：魔幻列车大冒险

title: Xiaohu Huan Xiang
synopsis: The little tiger and his mother lived carefreely in the vast forest. However, one day, the iron hoof of a poacher broke through the tranquility of the land, and the little tiger fell into a trap and was caught by the poacher. . An accident caused the truck with the little tiger to fall off the cliff, and the little tiger regained his freedom. 　　 By chance, the tiger trainer Yanyan and Dalong found the little tiger who had nowhere to go. They mistaken the little tiger for the little white cat and took it in. At the same time, poachers who were unwilling to give up followed followed. In the battle of wits and courage with the poachers, the little tiger is separated from the kind dragon, and the big dragon also learns the true identity of the little tiger and embarks on a journey to save the little tiger. Afterwards, Xiaohu who fled all the way got to know the donkey and ran. They determined to help each other, support each other, and return to their own homeland.(translated from douban)

title: Meng Li Ren
synopsis: The biggest worry of ordinary high school girl Li Mengling is that she has always been just an ordinary girl, until one day, an unusual magical rabbit Anne broke into her life, allowing her to achieve super powers after falling asleep every day Beautiful girl's dream. Wen Mo, Guo Youyong, and Sun Yuzhou, the big boys of the self-proclaimed "Home of the Universe" band, also appeared around her. Their great dream is to travel to the universe. Dreams are sometimes illusory, and sometimes extremely real-Li Mengling, who is sandwiched between illusion and reality, is also full of perplexity at the beautiful age of sixteen.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Dongfang Shen Wa
synopsis: Nuwa used the land of light to create a straightforward, kind-hearted, bold and righteous dragon baby. Using the bright water to create a heroic, gentle and lovely Fengwa, Longwa and Fengwa regarded Nuwa as their mother. A huge black hole appeared in the sky, and the entire human world was about to be destroyed. Nuwa cooked the five-color stone and tried to fill the loopholes, but sealed Longwa and Fengwa in the sky. Since then, mother and child were forced to separate. The sad Nuwa missed her children every day, and her tears gathered on the earth and became the Yellow River. 　　 One hundred years later, the world has been violated by evil forces, and Nu Wa is also trapped in the world, unable to do anything. At this juncture, Dragon Baby and Feng Baby embarked on a journey to find their mother after they learned a good skill in the heavens. Along the way, they were waiting for them with powerful and evil enemies.(translated from douban)

title: Dongfang Shen Wa season 2
synopsis: The Eastern Goddess turned into a land and water of light and flew towards the sun and moon that lost its light, and the world reappeared in light. However, after a long period of rebirth, the dark forces have cultivated dark fighters, invading the world, and mankind is facing a crisis. In order to quell the catastrophe, the Eastern God Baby returned to the world after the sun and the moon were reconstructed. But the dark fighters turned the beasts of the world into the beast fighters, the killers of darkness, and the battle between humans and animals began. The Eastern God Baby influenced the beast fighters through her own efforts, and together with the space fighters defeated the dark forces again and saved the peaceful earth. What on earth did the God Baby rely on to overcome the dangers and defeat the powerful dark fighters? The maze is about to be revealed...(translated from douban)
background: This anime won "National Excellent Animation Award", "China International Audiovisual Products Fair Gold Award".

title: Xindongfang Shen Wa
synopsis: Legend has it that the magic lamp dominates justice and light. For the peace of the world, the goddess of heaven and earth has kept the magic lamp for thousands of years. But the power of the demon world endangers the world. The goddess created the dragon baby and the phoenix baby to jointly defend the peace of the world. 　　 But the magic stone destroyed the energy of the magic lamp, and the goddess sacrificed herself to regain the light of the magic lamp, protecting the veins of heaven and earth, and the mother and child separated. With his love for his mother, love for the peace of the world, the dragon and phoenix god baby, with a tenacious belief, through all difficulties and obstacles, finally eradicated the monsters, regained the energy of the magic lamp, saved his mother, and regained peace in the world.(translated from douban)

title: Kewang Lantian
synopsis: In the world of prehistoric creatures, a small feathered dinosaur furry from nowhere was born. Because of its distinctive pedigree and physical advantage, it was left out by the companions of the ethnic group. In order to gain acceptance from the ethnic group and find his own life experience, Maomao left his homeland and embarked on a series of adventures. With the help of partners of different races, Mao Mao overcame difficulties and continued to grow. Gradually, Maomao discovered that his incompatible feathers could help it fly, and escaped the dangers. The disadvantages became advantages. Finally one day, Maomao found a new companion who had evolved, and together they fluttered into the long-awaited blue sky.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Kewang Lantian
synopsis: The season 2 of Kewang Lantian

title: Xiao Liyu Lixian Ji
synopsis: Bubble (voiced by Wu Fengchun) is a very ordinary little carp. One day, its hometown Carp Lake was harmed by the evil snake (voiced by Jia Xiaojun). In desperation, Bubble could only leave his hometown, and was left behind. life. Bubbles learned that only with the help of the dragon's power can he defeat the snake, so he embarked on a journey to find the dragon scales. The taciturn, steady and reliable Aku (voiced by Li Jinyan), Xiao Meimei (voiced by Chen Hong) who has a beautiful singing voice but weak body, and a double-sided turtle with soft ears and no assertiveness (voiced by Zhang Yunlong). Paobu met these very different personalities along the way. But the same kind-hearted partners have become the most persistent and stable support for each other. The fishes have established deep feelings and tempered their will in the process of enduring hardships and persecution. In the end, Bubble successfully retrieved the five dragon scales scattered everywhere, and came to the skin of the snake.(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Niu Xiang Qian Chong
synopsis: The big horn bull accidentally released the sealed bat demon, which brought the catastrophe to most of the cows, but at the summoning ceremony of the lotus lantern, he confirmed the prophecy of the hero Niu Dahan and became the savior of the cow. In order to find the cow profusely, Bighorn Bull and his friends have gone through all kinds of dangers and finally arrived at the magical world of Paloda. Here, the big horns inspired the weak and depressed elf prince; resolved the old grievances between Snow Country and Caiyun Palace; and defended the source of life of Paloda. And Niu Da Khan has been silently helping him beside Big Horn Niu and fighting alongside him. Together, they prevented the Bat Demon from forging the black armor, and the evil deeds of the Toxic Pyleda, and shattered his ambition to dominate the world. In the many trials, Big Horn Niu's skill continued to grow, and his heart gradually became stronger. He finally grew into a qualified Niu Da Khan's successor and a true savior. He led everyone to annihilate the bat demon and restored peace and harmony to most cattle.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Shaolin Hai Bao
synopsis: The "Dahe Boy" who has been soaked in the Central Plains Shaolin culture for a long time and the Shanghai World Expo mascot "Haibao" and his companion Fancigar and the dog Douglas, in order to prevent the evil god of darkness from getting colorful beads, protecting Shaolin Temple, passing through time and space tunnels, coming from modern times The story of the ancient middle-earth apprentices and practice martial arts, and fought fierce battle with the dark war god.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Mei Hou Wang
synopsis: "The Monkey King" tells that on the Huaguo Mountain, the monkey group is nervously fighting with the demon king. A fairy stone that had been cultivated for many years on Huaguo Mountain suddenly burst, and a stone monkey was born from it. Under the guidance of the old monkey king, the stone monkey went from being crowded out by the monkey group to becoming the monkey king. In order to better protect Huaguoshan, with everyone's persuasion, the little stone monkey decided to go to sea to learn art. The stone monkey came to Fangcun Mountain in Lingtai to learn from Bodhi Patriarch. Not only did he succeed in learning, but he also made new friends such as Honghaier, Yutu, and Ginseng Fruit. In addition, he also had his own name-Monkey King. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Dajiao Niu Meng Gongchang
synopsis: After the original guardian of Niu Dadu retired, he entrusted Grandpa Niu to hand over a magic weapon, the foolish gourd, to a brave who could become the new guardian of Niu Dadu. As a result, Big Horn Niu was selected. Confused Gourd has the ability to reward good Gourd Beans to people who are upright and worthy of praise, and use bad Gourd Beans to punish those who make mistakes and bad intentions. The badass bat demon on Moonback Mountain was jealous of the big horn bull's good reputation, and tried his best to make the big horn bull ugly, and exhausted his bad ideas to tease and frame the big horn bull. But with the help of the confused gourd and his friends, Bighorn Bull smashed the bat demon's conspiracy time and time again, making the bat devil suffer for the bad things he did.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Sui Tang Heroes
synopsis: At the end of the Sui and Tang dynasties, Yang Guang, the second son of Emperor Wen of the Sui Dynasty, wanted to usurp the throne. In order to take refuge, Li Yuan plans to leave Beijing with his family and return home. Li Yuan’s second son, Li Shimin, did not want to leave the capital because she was in love with her eldest grandson. The eldest grandson was a very visionary girl. She persuaded Li Shimin to go home temporarily, study hard and watch the world change. Li Shimin obeyed her advice and left Beijing. Homecoming. On the way, Li Shimin was attacked by a Luoyang killer bought by Yang Guang. During the crisis, he happened to meet Qin Qiong, who was escorting the prisoners. After Qin Qiong repelled Liao Wuji and rescued Li Shimin, he learned that the killer was sent by Yang Guang. He was afraid of trouble and left without saying goodbye. . In order to repay Qin Qiong’s life-saving grace, Li Shimin erected a temple for Qin Qiong as a memorial. (A few years later, Qin Qiong knew how Li Shimin knew his favor, so he resolutely followed.) After Qin Qiong sent the prisoner to Luzhou, because of the theft of tolls and a serious illness, when he was forced to sell his yellow horse, he met Shan Xinxiong, a hero in the green forest. He has always respected Qin Qiong's personality and martial arts, so he gave a generous gift of silver. On the way home, Qin Qiong was guilty of believing that a shopkeeper was a ringing horse, and was convicted of beating the shopkeeper to death. He was sent to Yanshan by the local government. Later, because of Luo Cheng’s father, Luo Yi, he went to Shandong Jiedu to use Tang Bi as a banner. official. Soon after Qin Qiong arrived in Shandong, Yang Chang murdered Emperor Wen of Sui to usurp the throne. When he forced Minister Wu Jianzhang to forge a will to inform the world, Jianzhang was killed, causing Jianzhang's son, Nanyang Prefect Wuzhi, to rise up against the Sui Dynasty. Yang Guang ordered Han Qinhu to ascend to the throne after an amnesty in Nanyang. After the severely sentenced Cheng Yaojin was rescued from prison, Shan Xiongxin saw that he was a hero, so he took him into a robbery no-profit business, but he had to rely on the mountain king Yang Lin’s hundreds of thousands of taels of silver, so he burned and arrested him in public. Ticket. Unexpectedly, Shan Xiongxin and Cheng Yaojin were arrested in Huangtugang again, so Xu Maogong and other heroes returned to Shandong, rescued the two people, gathered in Wagangzhai, and supported Cheng Yaojin as the "Hunting Demon King", smashing the multiple conquests of the Sui army. . Yang Guang, the emperor, was going to Yangzhou for a cruise and ordered the canal to be dug. Corrupt officials took the opportunity to search the people's fat, harm the people, make the people unhappy, the world is chaotic, and the heroes are everywhere. At this time, Li Yuan, who had been hesitating, under Li Shimin's persuasion, also attacked Taiyuan, attacked Chang'an, and became the king of Tang. Cheng Yaojin of the Wagang Army felt that being an emperor was boring and gave the throne to Li Mi, a counselor. Li Mi set himself up as the king of the Western Wei Dynasty and led the troops to sweep the Sui Dynasty, and received a response from the world. Emperor Sui Yang, who had traveled to Yangzhou fortunately, was finally killed by his most trusted Yu Culture. Li Mi took the opportunity to take down Yangzhou. But he didn't want to make progress, began to corrupt and degenerate, but also jealous of his subordinates, and brutally killed his close comrades. But Li Shimin, who is ambitious and far-sighted, is thirst for talents and recruits talents. He very much appreciates the view of the eldest grandson girl who has become his wife: the battle to unify the world is also a battle for talents. Whoever has a group of outstanding talents can win the world by trusting and relying on these talents. As a result, the advisers and generals who had rebelled against Li Mi voted in Li Shimin's sect, and Li Mi, who had rebelled against his family, was finally defeated by the Chinese Iranian Wang Shichong. Under the command of Li Shimin, Xu Maogong, Qin Qiong, Yu Chigong, Cheng Yaojin, Luo Cheng and others led their troops to defeat the Eighteenth Route. In this war of unification, Li Shimin was helped by the eighteen stick monks of Shaolin Temple and killed Wang Shichong to perform a rather magical story. However, the talented Li Shimin has always been hated by Prince Li Jiancheng and Qi Wang Li Yuanji. After their conspiracy to murder Li Shimin was exposed, the unbearable Li Shimin finally launched the "Xuanwumen Change", except for Li Jiancheng and Li Yuanji. Afterwards, Li Shimin was also supported by the officials to ascend the throne of God, for Tang Taizong.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Qinhan Yingxiong Chuan
synopsis: After Qin destroyed the Six Kingdoms, Zhang Liang, who was born in the original Korean nobleman, was dissatisfied with the rule of the Qin Dynasty and planned to plan a "beheading operation" to assassinate Qin Shihuang. But their premeditated plan was noticed by the government's Tingwei Mansion. When Zhang Liang went to Xingyang to report on the action plan to the kings and grandchildren of South Korea and the elders of South Korea, they were raided by the Tingwei Mansion's post, but Zhang Liang managed to escape. In order to avenge South Korea, Zhang Liang organized two operations to assassinate Qin Shihuang. After the operation failed, Zhang Liang fled to the Xiapi countryside to hide in order to avoid the search. By coincidence, he got the "Taigong Art of War" from Huangshi Gong. After that, he carefully studied the art of war and patiently waited for the opportunity. Qin Shihuang died while traveling to the sand dunes, and Zhao Gao, who drove along, induced Li Si to jointly launch a coup d'etat with him and assisted Hu Hai to ascend the throne. It was for Qin II. After Qin II ascended the throne, he launched a big killing, and his faintness accelerated the demise of the Qin Dynasty. As Chen Sheng and Wu Guang launched an uprising in Daze Township, the world's heroes came together, and Liu Bang and Xiang Yu also took advantage of the situation. At this time, Zhang Liang, who lived in seclusion in the countryside, came out again and finally stayed with Liu Bang. As Liu Bang's uprising army approached Xianyang, Zhao Gao sent Yan Le to pacify the rebels and sent Yan Le to kill the second king and prepared to help the son-in-law, but he didn't want to be killed by Qin E Qiren. After that, history entered the stage of "Chu and Han quarreling". After a thrilling "Hongmen Banquet" was played in the Romance, after Liu Bang escaped from the dead, the situation reversed and the balance of victory fell to Liu Bang's side. Although Liu Bang is not good at dispatching troops and generals, he is better at garnering talents. There are not only strategists like Zhang Liang, but also Xiao He who understands economy and good management, and Han Xin, a famous general. These heroes showed their talents vividly and vividly. After the immortal battles such as "Ming Xiu plank roads, secretly crossing Chen Cang", "Back to the Water", "Ambush on Ten Sides" and other immortal battles, Liu Bang won the final victory and established the Han Dynasty. After Zhang Liang became famous, when he went to Huangshigang to pay homage to his teacher Huangshigong, he met the Ximen geese who had lived and died with him. Ximen geese walked away after Han Wangsun was named the king of Han by Xiang Yu and wanted to make her the princess. The appearance of Ximen Yan surprised and delighted Zhang Liang. The two lovers seem to have a lot to say, but they don't know where to start. For a long time, Zhang Liang said, "Little Goose, you have been working hard these years." The two watched each other in the snow, and finally together...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiongmao He Xiao Yan Shu
synopsis: "Panda and Little Mole" is a cartoon about friendship, mutual help and growth. The story not only incorporates a lot of Chinese elements, but also introduces internationally common cartoon language to make the plot more humorous. This film takes the Chinese national treasure "Panda", which is beloved by children all over the world, and the Czech national cartoon character "Little Mole" as the protagonists. It tells the story of Mole encountering pandas in China and between them and many good friends. A warm, humorous, and harmonious story presents the sincere friendship of a pair of happy brothers for the children. The film will not only bring more laughter to the children, but the respect for ecological civilization and life value conveyed in the story will also make the film a new classic of green cartoons with ideological enlightenment.(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Jigong
synopsis: Based on the psychology and perspective of contemporary children and the unique visual language of animation, "Little Jigong" tells the story of my country's famous folk legend Jigong who used his wisdom, wisdom, justice and courage to help the poor and help others when he was a child. The storyline in the film is quite interesting and thought-provoking, allowing the audience to comprehend the truth of being a person and doing things in a subtle way.(translated from douban)

title: Mianhua Tang He Yunduo Mama
synopsis: Marshmallow, the big-headed son, and Xiaoming are very good friends. Among them, Marshmallow has a timid personality. In order to become brave, she formulated a "Brave Plan" for herself and made great efforts. With the help of a group of friends, Marshmallow finally mustered up the courage and realized his dream.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Mianhua Tang He Yunduo Mama season2
synopsis: The season 2 of Mianhua Tang He Yunduo Mama.

details.Japanese: 棉花糖和云朵妈妈 第二季

title: Mianhua Tang He Yunduo Mama Meimeng Cheng Zhen
synopsis: In the play, the cute pig Xiaodou brings cotton candy to the magical dream world, which is what everyone dreams of: the big head becomes a bridge engineer, and the cotton candy becomes a "lollipop beautiful girl". The world changed rapidly. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 棉花糖和云朵妈妈 美梦成真

title: Mianhua Tang He Yunduo Mama Zhi Fu Shu Song Ji
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 棉花糖和云朵妈妈之福鼠送吉

title: Mianhua Tang He Yunduo Mama Chaoji Xiao Mihua
synopsis: "Marshmallow and Yunduo Mom · Super Millet Flower" tells the childish story of Marshmallow, Yunduo's mother and Xiao Mihua participating in the lucky dog competition. With the patient training of Marshmallow and Yunduo’s mother, Mihua worked hard to overcome the shortcomings of fear of noise, and learned the festive and festive lion dance. As time progressed, the game became heated. At the critical moment when Mi Hua and the artificial intelligence dog compete for the championship, there was an unexpected event on the stage. Mi Hua jumped off the competition stage desperately, protected Marshmallow and Mingming with her body, and lost the qualification for the competition. The omnipotent artificial intelligence dog Standing steadily on the stage, indifferent to the danger of the little master.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 棉花糖和云朵妈妈·超级小米花

title: Gushi Nainai
synopsis: It tells the story of three cute children with various shortcomings in order to save their parents. Under the guidance of the grandmother of the story, they overcome the difficulties, defeated the evil power of Bobotou, and purified the polluted Taoyuan Wonderland. In the end, he not only rescued his parents, but also gradually grew into a virtuous and responsible boy.(translated from douban)

title: Douluo Dalu: Zhi Hanhai Qiankun Pian
synopsis: Seventh part of Douluo Dalu.

details.Synonyms: Douluo Dalu 1st Season Part 7, Soul Land 7th Season
details.Japanese: 斗罗大陆之瀚海乾坤篇

title: Tropical-Rouge! Precure
synopsis: The anime centers on Manatsu, who moves from her small island birthplace to a city and starts middle school. On the day she moves she meets a mermaid girl named Laura who is looking for the "legendary warriors," the Precures. Laura's hometown, the mermaid country of Grand Ocean, has been attacked by the "procrastination witch," who has stolen the country's "motivation power." (Source: ANN)

details.Japanese: トロピカル～ジュ！プリキュア

title: Shanhe Jian Xin
synopsis: Yan Wushi had walked a path full of blood and corpses. He did not believe in the good nature of humanity. Even more so, he did not believe that there could be someone with great kindness and sense of justice, who would be so considerate of others without asking anything in return. One day, Shen Qiao, who was the sect leader of Mount Xuandu, the number one Daoist sect under the heavens, was challenged to a duel but somehow fell off the cliff. Yan Wushi happened to pass by down there. Seeing Shen Qiao who was seriously injured to the point of dying, he suddenly came up with a perfect idea… After thousands of autumns, who could stay eternal? (Source: Novel Updates)
background: Adapted from the novel Qian Qiu (千秋) by Meng Xi Shi (梦溪石).
